FuncDef:
The capability command enables a PCE client (PCC) to generate RSVP-TE and segment-routing TE (SR-MPLS TE) initiated LSPs.
The undo capability command disables a PCC from generating RSVP-TE and SR-MPLS TE initiated LSPs.
By default, a PCC is disabled from generating initiated LSPs.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables a PCC to generate PCE initiated LSPs.
-

Enables the segment routing capability on a PCC.
-

Enables a PCC to process label stitch messages.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a PCC to support segment routing, run the capability segment-routing command.
To enable a PCC to support initiated-lsp, run the capability initiated-lsp command.
Prerequisites
A PCE client has been configured using the pce-client command.
Configuration Impact
After the capability command is run, changing the PCC capability initiates existing PCEP sessions.
